test.instr: (:ins (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X sofa))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (color X green) (sort X cup))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (color X white) (sort X bottle))) (:task (close X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator) (type X container))) (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X red))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X cupboard) (type X container) (type X container))) (:cons_notnot (:info (closed X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X cupboard) (type X container)))) (:cons_not (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (type Y container) (sort Y refrigerator) (type Y container)))) )
test.nl: Go to sofa. Pick up the green can. Pick up white bottle. Close the refrigerator. There is the red bottle on plate. The cupboard is closed. Pick up the green cup. There must be cupboard is closed. Do not put a bottle in refrigerator.
